name: hydration

effect.black_white: This Pokémon is cured of any major status ailment after each turn during rain.
effect.black_2_white_2: This Pokémon is cured of any major status ailment after each turn during rain.

short_effect: Cures any major status ailment after each turn during rain.

flavor_text.black_white: Heals status problems if it is raining.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Heals status problems if it is raining.
